entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who had fastened golden balloons. He is described as saying he won't bother with robes when he gets married.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as Fred's twin brother and friend of Harry's. He is described as saying that their mother wasn't too bad this morning.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as the groom who will shortly become husband to Fleur.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as the bride who will shortly become wife to Bill.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a guest at the wedding and is described as being uncomfortable in his robes.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as someone who is not present at the wedding and whom George says no one wants.

relationships.description: Fred and George are described as twin brothers.
Bill and Fleur are described as becoming husband and wife shortly.
